name: Kuan-Hao Huang, Assistant Professor
department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
research: My research focuses on natural language processing, with a focus on developing trustworthy and generalizable language AI systems. These systems aim to understand human concepts, speak human languages, and perform logical reasoning. Additionally, they are designed to be robust, reliable, and adaptable to new domains, languages, and modalities.
prospective_students: Looking for self-motivated students to join my group in Fall 2026. Interested in large language models, multimodal learning, or multilingual NLP should find more information here.
